QuestData.Title: Invading Spelunkers
QuestData.Description:
The drogbar and their earthen furies have overrun the cavern. They're perverting the magic within and destroying the elementals that have forever dwelled in this place.
Let's work together to remove them from this sacred cave.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay $1oa Drogbar Manathirsters or Violent Crageaters.
QuestData.CompletionText: We must cleanse the cavern of the drogbar.
